title: Life in Ancient Greece: role of the citizen
brief_description: Recreates political and economic life in a Greek city-state in 400 BC. Discusses the privleges and responsibilities of citizenship and shows Greek youths taking the Ephebic Oath. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
